textBox.richText: In this latest beta we are starting to focus on the smaller issues which means that we are very close to releasing 1.5. You can download the latest beta from here. Currently the issues that have been addressed are: • More issues resolved with connectivity to servers for processing. • Header scripts should now be injecting properly. • Body scripts should now be injecting properly. • Body scripts should now be injecting properly. • Other issues with Snow Leopard and general stability corrected.
